column4: question, if i upgrade to 11.10 from the update manager, will all my files still be on the system, including the programs i currnetly have installed??
yes
i also have burg installed ontop of grub, will i have to reinstall burg?
Probably unless burg is in repos
how would i find out if its in the repos?
did you install it from repos
i had to manually install it on this system previously
i believe it was a .deb package
Then best install grub again then upgrade then install burg
i dont understand why i would need to install grub again, its still installed currently
Then just upgrade
ok thx
are u using 11.10?
It will probably replace burg on mbr
are u using 11.10?
Yes but Kubuntu 11.10
ok, i was wondering about the speed of the system basically
im still with 10.04 because i found it super fast
My experience on this here I tested all varriants  http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1889502
one last quesiton, currently im running a pae kernel, i was wondering if 11.10 will default and give me the option to or automatically install a pae kernel
Manual install is possible
